live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.

Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42464.summary: Some customers in Surrey (Simon Fraser University) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42464.title: Sept 30 - Surrey  (Simon Fraser University) | All Services - (Fix in Progress)
